title: Spotify Listening Dashboard
text:
This dashboard provides comprehensive insights into your personal Spotify listening habits, including daily patterns, monthly trends, and weekly listening behaviors.



Daily Listening Patterns: Track your daily song consumption over time
Monthly Summaries: Analyze monthly trends and averages
Weekly Patterns: Discover your listening habits by day of the week
Recent Activity: View your most recent listening activity
Comprehensive Statistics: Detailed metrics about your listening behavior




Navigate to the Dashboard to explore your listening data and discover insights about your music consumption patterns.

Data is automatically updated from your Spotify listening history
